text: Edwin Lorimer Thomas from Rice University, was awarded the status of Fellow in the American Physical Society, after they were nominated by their Division of Polymer Physics in 1985, for being a leading authority on the application of electron microscopy and scattering techniques to problems in polymer structure-property relations and for contributions on mosaic block structure of semicrystalline polymers as well as on the structure of the noncrystalline solid state of glassy polymers. == References == Category:Fellows of the American Physical Society Category:American physicists Category:Minnesota CEMS
title: Edwin Lorimer Thomas
